description: Session fixation vulnerability in EasyBlocks IPv6 Ver. 2.0.1 and earlier, and Enterprise Ver. 2.0.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to impersonate a registered user and log in the management console, that may result in information alteration/disclosure via unspecified vectors.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Ver. 2.0.1 and earlier, and Enterprise Ver. 2.0.1 and earlier
